remarks: Product of exponents law for complex exponentiation.  Proposition 10-4.2(b) of [Gleason] p. 135.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
rpcxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
rpcxpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxpmuld.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
cxpmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) ^c C ) ) $.
